title: Where are the attachments? And how do I scroll messages and inbox list?
content:
I'm having troubles with Thunderbird version 140.6.0esr(64-bits) on Ubuntu 25.10 (fully updated). It's installed as a snap.

The first problem is that I have a selected mail with an attachment, but nowhere in the mail itself I can see or find or open or download that attachment.

The second problem is that for the inbox and mail body I can't scroll. There are no scrollbars, and the mouse-wheel doesn't work.

Is it a problem with snap? With Ubuntu? Or with Thunderbird itself? Could if be a configuration problem (I've tried quite a lot of things already)?
